title: Diatomaceous Earth Bath Mat, 47x15.7 in - Diatomaceous Thin Bath Mat, Non Slip Ultra Thin Bathroom Rugs Fit Under Door, Quick Dry Super Absorbent Bath Mat with Gifts, Color Grey
features: A Must have! - Soft Diatomaceous Bath Mat Gray is a modern minimalist design that is easy to flatten with no bends. Ultra thin bath mat that fit under your door, can be cut to fit and is easy to clean, unlike any normal shower mat.

Instant Self-Dry! - Our quick drying mat is made of natural mineral ''Diatom Mud''. Its surface has many fine pores, keeping the surface dry and have strong water absorption performance, which is a good product for household life.

Non Slip Mat! - Who needs slippery mats that put your safety at risk? This diatomaceous earth mat has a premium quality textured rubber that helps to prevent the mat from moving. No worry about slipping especially from the elderly and children.
Multi-Purpose Mat! - Our fast drying bath mat is not only for bathroom but you can also use this in your kitchen, laundry room, play mat and pet feeding mat.
100% Customer Satisfaction - Your satisfaction matters to us. If there is any problem with our product waterproof mat for under sink you are backed by our 30-Days Free replacement or money-back .
description: Are you bored with the original and traditional bath mat?  Do you still worry about your bathroom getting wet?   Worry no more, our Non-Slip Absorbent Mat can solve all your worries.   SIZE: 47.2 x 15.3 x 0.15 inches  COLOR: Grey  USAGE: Our Non-Slip Absorbent Mat can be used in the Bathroom, Kitchen, Foyer, Laundry area, Swimming pool area.   OVERVIEW:   Our Non-Slip Absorbent Mat product is a new upgrade bath mat. Stylist product that will go well in your kitchen and bathroom. Made of natural safe diatomaceous earth. That has a quick-drying ability.   Our product is a non-slip mat. That has rubber that helps to prevent the mat from moving. No worry about slipping especially from the elderly and children. Our Non-Slip Absorbent Mat is comfortable, soft, and machine washable. You can also wash it by hand using clean water. The thickness of our Non-Slip Absorbent Mat is 0.15 inches. The mat can be easily folded for storage and placed in a dry and ventilated place. Our quick-drying mat also can be used for your pet dog and cat.   What are you looking for? ADD TO CART NOW!
